window.title: PlayKit SDK Settings
header.title: PlayKit SDK
header.subtitle: Unity Native-AI Game Development Kit
config.auth.title: Developer Authentication
config.auth.logged_in: You are logged in. Select a game below to start developing.
config.auth.not_logged_in: Please login to access your games and start developing.
config.auth.logout_confirm: Are you sure you want to logout? You will need to login again to access your games.
config.game.title: Game Selection
config.game.no_games: No games found. Please create a game at https://playkit.ai/dashboard first.
config.models.title: AI Model Defaults
config.models.info: Configure default AI models for your game.
config.models.chat.label: Default Chat Model
config.models.image.label: Default Image Model
config.models.image.tooltip: Select the default image generation model
config.models.select_game_first: Please select a game first to load available models.
dev.tools.title: Developer Tools
dev.storage.title: Developer Token Storage
dev.storage.use_local.tooltip:
Enabled: Token stored in EditorPrefs (local, not tracked by version control)
Disabled: Token stored in project settings (can be committed, suitable for team sharing)
dev.storage.local_mode: Local Mode: Token stored in local EditorPrefs, not tracked by Git. Suitable for personal development.
dev.storage.project_mode: Project Mode: Token stored in project settings, can be committed to version control. Suitable for team sharing (private repos).
dev.token.title: Developer Token (Optional)
dev.token.label: Token
dev.token.ignore.tooltip: Force player authentication flow for testing
dev.player_token.clear.title: Clear Player Token
dev.player_token.clear.confirm: Are you sure you want to clear the local player token? You'll need to login again on next run.
dev.player_token.clear.success.title: Success
about.version.title: Version Information
about.links.title: Quick Links
about.resources.title: Resources & Support
about.examples.title: Examples
about.examples.not_found: No example scenes found in the SDK.
common.failed: Failed to load PlayKit settings. Please check console for errors.
update.check_failed.title: Update Check Failed
update.available.title: SDK Update Available
update.no_updates.title: No Updates Available
update.no_updates.message: You are using the latest version ({0}).
language.selector.title: Language
config.basic.title: Basic Settings
config.advanced.title: Advanced Settings
config.advanced.info: Only modify these settings if you know what you're doing.
config.advanced.custom_url.label: Custom Base URL
config.advanced.custom_url.tooltip: Override the default API base URL. Leave empty to use default (https://playkit.ai).
dev.device_auth.title: Browser Login
dev.device_auth.info: Login with your browser to automatically get a developer token. This is the recommended way to authenticate.
dev.device_auth.success_message: Developer token has been obtained and saved successfully.
dev.device_auth.not_developer: You are not a developer. Please create a game in the PlayKit dashboard first.
dev.device_auth.register_hint: To become a developer, visit https://playkit.ai/dashboard and create your first game.
